articles.title: 2022 NFL free agency: Latest league news from Monday, March 14 - NFL.com
articles.description: Brian Hoyer is sticking around in New England for another go-around, signing a two-year deal with the Patriots ahead of free agency. See what else happened Monday as the 2022 negotiating window opened.
articles.content:
The New England Patriots are keeping Mac Jones' tutor in Foxborough.
The Pats agreed to a two-year contract with backup quarterback Brian Hoyer, his agent announced Monday morning.
